https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/abbre._instruction: Enter the official abbreviation of this parcellation entity version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/abbre.label: Abbreviation
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/abbre.name: abbreviation

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/addit._instruction: Enter any additional remarks concerning this parcellation entity version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/addit.description: Mention of what deserves additional attention or notice.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/addit.label: Additional remarks
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/addit.name: additionalRemarks

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/alter._instruction: Enter any alternate names, including any alternative abbreviations, for this parcellation entity version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/alter.label: Alternate name
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/alter.name: alternateName

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/corre._instruction: Enter the refined or corrected name of this parcellation entity version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/corre.label: Corrected name
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/corre.name: correctedName

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/hasAn._instruction: Add all atlas annotations which define this parcellation entity version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/hasAn.label: Has annotation
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/hasAn.name: hasAnnotation

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/hasPa._instruction: Add all anatomical parent structures (or version of the structures) for this parcellation entity as defined within corresponding brain atlas version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/hasPa.description: Reference to a parent object or legal person.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/hasPa.label: Has parent
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/hasPa.name: hasParent

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/looku._instruction: Enter a lookup label for this parcellation entity version that may help you to find this instance more easily.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/looku.label: Lookup label
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/looku.name: lookupLabel

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name._instruction: Enter the name of this parcellation entity version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name.description: Word or phrase that constitutes the distinctive designation of a being or thing.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name.label: Name
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name.name: name

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/ontol._instruction: Enter the internationalized resource identifiers (IRIs) to the related ontological terms matching this parcellation entity version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/ontol.description: Term or code used to identify something or someone registered within a particular ontology.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/ontol.label: Ontology identifier
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/ontol.name: ontologyIdentifier

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/relat._instruction: Add all relations (qualitative or quantitative) of this parcellation entity version to other anatomical entities.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/relat.label: Relation assessment
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/relat.name: relationAssessment

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/versi._instruction: Enter the version identifier of this parcellation entity version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/versi.description: Term or code used to identify the version of something.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/versi.label: Version identifier
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/versi.name: versionIdentifier

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/versi._instruction: Enter a short description (or summary) of the novelties/peculiarities of this parcellation entity version in comparison to its preceding versions. If this parcellation entity version is the first version, leave blank.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/versi.description: Documentation on what changed in comparison to a previously published form of something.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/versi.label: Version innovation
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/versi.name: versionInnovation
